# color

**Instance Property**

The color of this indicator.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var color: NSColor! { get set }
```

## Discussion

If set to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ObjectiveC/nil-227m0], returns [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSColor/textInsertionPointColor]. Defaults to [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSColor/textInsertionPointColor].

## Configuring indicators

- **effectsViewInserter**: An optional closure the system calls during dictation.
